title: Dickens on the Strand
text: Dickens on the Strand is an annual Christmas festival organized by the Galveston Historical Foundation in <a href="Galveston%2C%20Texas">Galveston, Texas</a> occurring the first weekend in December. Established in 1974 and set against the historical backdrop of Galveston's Strand, participants come to witness and relive the <a href="Charles%20Dickens">Charles Dickens</a> era. Saturday features a parade featuring Queen Victoria and there is a costume contest on Sunday. Participants dressed in <a href="Victorian%20fashion">Victorian fashion</a> are admitted for half price. Admission also includes access to the <a href="Elissa%20%28ship%29">Elissa</a>, a merchant vessel built in 1877.
